Concept: User is unable to log into the patient portal
Notes:
Follow the below steps
1. Check if a valid  'userId' has been provided by the user. If not available prompt the user. Do not proceed further
2. Check inside the patient  portal access-control-list if this user has been added
3. If not added, add the userID to this list
4. Inform the user to check if they can access the patient portal

Follow the below steps
1. Grab the userId of this user
2. Check inside the  Identity API access-control-list if this user has been added
3. If not added, add the userID to this list
4. Inform the user to check if they can access the  Identity API

Follow the below steps
Inform the user to dial 1-800-232-4516 to speak with support team

Concept: How can get help on travel related queries
Notes: For travel related querues chat with customer support on TravelHelp chat line

Concept: How can get help on billing issues
Notes: For any billing issues pls join the weekly zoom call at 9pm CST on wednesdays

Concept: I need help with moving stuff
Notes: To seek help in moving visit the Facilities mgmt office located on 3rd floow of MN101 building
Put in a ticket in Incident mgmt system

Concept: I need to add a new feature that impacts different teams
Notes: Create an AHA request on the business portal
